Monitoring
Procedure in which deviations between observable actual states and the desired target states are detected during the operation of an →KI system.
Non-discrimination
Characteristic of an open process carried out by an →KI system ...
qualities: AI system has property functioning in principle and during operation.
Monitoring detects deviations between actual and target states.
Deviations occur during operation of a KI system.
Non-discrimination is a characteristic of an open process by a KI system.
Non-discrimination ensures no mistreatment based on legally protected characteristics.

User information
Characteristics of an →AI system with regard to the quality of information ...
qualities: AI system has characteristic User information.
User information relates to quality of information, interaction and operation by a user.
AI system includes knowledge of AI involvement.
AI system includes quality of the user experience.
Robustness allows regular behavior in adverse conditions.
